prompt: An illustration of the reduction from densest $k$-subgraph to {{\sc u-rcp}}. On the left there is a simple undirected graph $G$ with a single edge. The $2$-reduced directed graph of $G$ is on the right. Each vertex of $G$ is replaced by $2\cdot2 = 4$ copies with a bidirectional edge connecting any two copies of the same vertex, and an outgoing edge from each copy to the single edge-vertex $e$.
